commands.name: az servicebus queue authorization-rule create
commands.summary: Create an authorization rule for a queue.
examples: az servicebus queue authorization-rule create --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --queue-name myqueue --name myauthorule --rights Listen

commands.name: az servicebus queue authorization-rule delete
examples: az servicebus queue authorization-rule delete --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --queue-name myqueue --name myauthorule

commands.name: az servicebus queue authorization-rule list
commands.summary: List all authorization rules for a queue.
examples: az servicebus queue authorization-rule list --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --queue-name myqueue

commands.name: az servicebus queue authorization-rule show
commands.summary: Get an authorization rule for a queue by rule name.
examples: az servicebus queue authorization-rule show --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --queue-name myqueue --name myauthorule

commands.name: az servicebus queue authorization-rule update
commands.summary: Update an authorization rule for a queue.
commands.syntax:
az servicebus queue authorization-rule update [--add]
                                              [--authorization-rule-name]
                                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                              [--ids]
                                              [--namespace-name]
                                              [--queue-name]
                                              [--remove]
                                              [--resource-group]
                                              [--rights]
                                              [--set]
                                              [--subscription]
examples: az servicebus queue authorization-rule update --resource-group myresourcegroup --namespace-name mynamespace --queue-name myqueue --name myauthorule --rights Send
